text: Motion
Motion
Motion

Producer,
would you like a refill?

Oh, yeah. You've worked really hard today,
so have as much as you want!

Hehe... then,
I'll have the one with soft serve on top.

Oh, for Mamimi, it's the melon cream soda.
In that case, I'll...

â€¦!
Sorry to interrupt, it's from Sakuya.
-Sakuya just said, "It's all over".

...You didn't,
need to go over there?

Oh, Sakuya isn't new to this kind of scene,
but why?
...It's nothing, really.

What?
It seems like it's bothering you!

I overheard Sakuya and the Producer
talking in the hallway the other day.

The other day...
Oh, you mean that time.

...But since you talked to the Producer,
it's probably all resolved, right...?
So, it's nothing, really.

...I see.
Sakuya herself said it was "nothing".
...I see.

But if anything bothers you,
I can listen to you too, just like Mamimi did.

Right now, what Sakuya needs is... not me,
but everyone's support, right?

...
Yeah.
